title: Gold ADC looking for a friendly support to duo with
body:
As stated in the title, looking for a support to duo with or any other role is fine too. I am very chill and laid back and hoping to play with someone with a similar mindset. 

my IGN: Fatbeats 
:)

replies.body:
Hey mate, I would be keen to duo. I only play support 24/7, have a decent size support champ pool.
Happy to do normal to see how we do :)
